page.title: 12Local History - Hittisleigh
page.content: The boundaries between the parishes of Cheriton Bishop and Hittisleigh are unchanged from Saxon times, and are indeed virtually the same as in the days of a Celtic settlement. The farm lane through Whitethorn follows the original Saxon track to the Corn Mill, which no longer exists. The Pound House, next to the farmhouse, pre-dates it, and still has a complete cider-press. The 3 oldest farms are Medlake, Whitethorn and Eastchurch, which are all Devon Longhouses, and some were extended to L-shape in the 16th century.
